name: Casual Shoppers
description: Younger customers with low income and minimal spending. They browse frequently but rarely purchase.
column6: free shipping. Remarketing campaigns with low purchase thresholds.

name: VIP Customers
description: Most valuable segment with highest spending and income. They know what they want and buy without extensive research.
column6: early access to new products. Dedicated customer service.

name: Browsers Without Conversion
description: Interested but not purchasing. Longest time since last purchase. High churn risk.

name: Digital Enthusiasts
description: Active omnichannel customers with high online purchases. Older segment comfortable with technology.
